msg
After we enter C sector, other combatants will hold the Houkai creatures in the outer area. Do not get too involved in battle. Try to delay their movement and create time for the repair group.
进入C区后，外围的崩坏生物就由其他战斗人员拖住，不要恋战，运用迂回的战术尽量拖延崩坏生物的行动，为维修组创造时间。
Cエリアに入ってからは、他の戦闘員が崩壊生物を食い止めます。対面による戦闘を避けつつ、迂回戦術で崩壊生物の動きを制限しますから、その間に修理を完了させてください。
C 에리아 진입 후 다른 전투원들이 붕괴 생물을 막아낼 거예요. 정면 교전을 피하면서 우회 전술로 붕괴 생물의 움직임을 제한할 테니, 그 사이에 수리를 완료해 주세요.

Once you enter the C area, the Avalanche creatures on the periphery will be stalled by other combatants, do not get attached to the battle and use circuitous tactics to delay the Avalanche creatures as much as possible to create time for the maintenance team.

Once in Area C, other combatants will hold off the disintegrating organisms. While avoiding face-to-face combat, use detour tactics to limit the movement of the disintegrating organisms, so that repairs can be completed in the meantime.
speaker
portraits
msg
You will then follow me to the main circuits. Himeko had abandoned the C sector so Houkai creatures are hiding in every corner... Someone must protect me.
然后你就陪我一起到主线路那边，毕竟刚才姬子放弃了C区的防守，现在崩坏生物隐藏在各个角落…一定要有人在身边保护我才行。
わかった。……あなたは私と一緒に主砲回路の方に来てちょうだい。姫子がさっきCエリアの防衛を放棄したから、今は崩壊生物があちこちに潜んでいるはず……誰かに守ってもらわなくちゃ。
알겠어요. ...당신은 나랑 같이 주포 회로 쪽으로 와요. 히메코가 방금 C 에리아 방어를 포기했으니, 이제 붕괴 생물이 곳곳에 숨어 있을 거야... 누군가 지켜줘야 해.

Then you will accompany me to the main line side, after all, just now Himeko abandoned the defense of the C area, and now the collapse creatures are hiding in all corners ... must have someone around to protect me to do so.

Ok. ...... you come with me to the main gun circuit. Himeko abandoned the defense of area C earlier, so there must be disintegrating organisms lurking here and there now. ...... I need someone to protect me.

你知道我在工作的时候不会太注意周围的情况…所以为了施工的正常进行，我需要你在边上放哨。
私が作業しているとき、周囲の状況にあまり注意を払っていないのは知っているでしょう……だから、修理を進めるにはあなたに見張っていてもらわないといけないのよ。
내가 작업할 때 주변 상황에 신경을 잘 못 쓴다는 거 알잖아... 그래서 수리를 진행하려면 당신이 지켜봐 주지 않으면 안 돼요.
You know I don't pay much attention to what's going on around me when I'm working...so for the construction to proceed properly, I need you to keep a lookout on the sidelines.
You know I don't pay much attention to what's going on around me when I'm working ...... so I need you to keep an eye on things for me to proceed with the repairs.

もちろん……損傷の程度が分からない状況では必ず直せるとは言えないけれど、手は尽くすわ。
물론이죠... 손상 정도를 모르는 상황에선 꼭 고칠 수 있다곤 말 못 하지만, 최선은 다 할 거예요.
Of course ... in the absence of confirmation of the extent of the damage I can not say that it can be repaired, we can only do our best.

성공하면 좋겠지만... 후퇴할 때는 날 두고 가지 말아줘... 으음, 좋아! 그럼 갈게.

1244: The situation is under control, but we can’t last long. How are the circuits?
情况还在可控范围，不过撑不了多久了，线路的情况如何？
状況は維持できています。ですが、いつまでも持ちません。ケーブルの状況はどうですか？
상황은 유지되고 있습니다. 하지만 오래 버틸 순 없어요. 케이블 상태는 어때요?
The situation is still under control, but it won't last much longer. What is the condition of the line?
The situation is maintainable. But it will not last forever. What about the cable situation?

Worse than I think. I thought it was just physical damage from the explosion, but because of the Houkai creatures’ attack, it’s not just the problem of circuits now. A lot of components are also wrecked.
情况比想象中的糟，原本我以为只是爆炸引起的物理损伤，但由于崩坏生物进攻C区，现在不仅是爆炸区域的线路问题，很多元件都已经破破烂烂了。
思ったより悪いわ。爆発によって引き起こされた物理的な損傷かと思っていたけれど、崩壊生物がCエリアに進攻したせいで、爆発エリアのケーブルだけじゃなく、いろんな部品がズタズタよ。
생각보다 심각해요. 폭발로 인한 물리적 손상인 줄 알았는데, 붕괴 생물이 C 에리아로 침투하면서 폭발 구역 케이블뿐만 아니라 여러 부품이 갈기갈기 찢겼어요.

The situation is worse than expected. Originally I thought it was just physical damage caused by the explosion, but due to the collapse creatures attacking Area C, now not only the wiring in the area of the explosion is a problem, but many components are broken.

It's worse than I thought. I thought it was physical damage caused by the explosion, but the disintegrating organisms have invaded the C-area, shredding not only the cables in the blast area, but also many other components.
I’m afraid a simple reconnection can’t solve the issue...
恐怕不是简单的重连可以解决的问题了……
単純に再接続で解決できる問題じゃないと思う……。
단순 재연결로 해결될 문제 같지 않아요....
I'm afraid it's not a problem that can be solved by a simple reconnection ......
I don't think this is a problem that can be solved by simply reconnecting. ......

msg
The lines in C sector compartments have suffered different levels of damage, but we don’t really need to worry about other areas. We just need to fix one of the lines.

Cエリアの各キャビンにあるケーブルの損傷程度はバラバラ……。ただ、今の状況ならどこも重要なケーブルじゃない。要は主砲回路のケーブルだけ修理できればいいんだから。
C 에리어 각 캐빈에 있는 케이블의 손상 정도는 제각각……. 하지만 지금 상황이라면 어디도 중요한 케이블이 아냐. 요점은 주포 회로의 케이블만 수리할 수 있으면 되는 거니까.
The various sections of the C compartment have varying degrees of damage, but we don't really need to bother with the rest, just fix one line.

The extent of damage to the cables in each cabin in area C varies ....... But none of the cables are critical in the current situation. The point is that we only need to repair the cables of the main gun circuit.
msg
So the best solution now is to find undamaged components from other compartments in C sector, then swap them to the lines.

C 에리어의 다른 캐빈에서 문제 없는 부품을 긁어모아 오자구요.
So now the most feasible way is to find intact components in other compartments of the C area to tear down the east wall to repair the west wall.
Scrape up the parts from the other cabins in area C that are not in question.
msg

But then you have to protect me to collect the components that can be used to do so, I'm afraid it will take a lot of time.
But to do that, I need you guys to protect me so that I can collect the parts. It's going to take quite a while, so please do me a favor.

你还记得真是熟练啊……连我都不可能把战舰内通风管的线路背的这么熟悉。
よくそんなにしっかり覚えているわね……私ですら戦艦内の排気ダクトのルートはそこまで詳しくないわよ。
그렇게 자세히 기억하고 있다니…… 나조차도 전함 내 배기 덕트의 경로는 그 정도로 자세히 알지 못하는데.
You still remember really skilled ah ...... even I can not be so familiar with the wiring of the ventilation pipes inside the battleship by heart.
I don't know how you remember it so well. ...... Even I'm not that familiar with the routes of the exhaust ducts in a battleship.
speaker
portraits
msg
We often use them to escape outside. Captain Himeko made us remember the internal structure of the battleship long ago.
在外面这些是经常用到的逃生手段，所以姬子队长早就让我们背熟战舰的内部结构了。
外ではこういうことが生き延びる術に繋がるのよ。だから、姫子隊長がずっと前から私たちに戦艦の内部構造を暗記させていたの。
밖에서는 이런 게 살아남는 방법이 되는 거야. 그래서 히메코 대장이 아주 전부터 우리에게 전함의 내부 구조를 암기하도록 시켰던 거야.
Outside these are often used as a means of escape, so Captain Himeko has long let us memorize the internal structure of the battleship.
Out there, this kind of thing is the art of survival. That's why Captain Himeko had us memorize the inner workings of a battleship long ago.

So you have anticipated there will be a fight in Hyperion.
看来你们早就预料到会在休伯利安号上发生战斗了么。
あなたたちは、ずっと前からハイペリオン号で戦闘が起こることを予想していたみたいね。
너희들은 오래전부터 히페리온 호에서 전투가 일어날 것을 예상하고 있었던 모양이네.
It seems that you have expected a battle on the USS Huberton.
It seems you guys have been anticipating a battle on the Hyperion for a long time.

msg
Yeah, Hyperion is the only thing we can rely on, it is also our last shield. We can’t survive if we are not familiar with it.
嗯，毕竟休伯利安是我们在外唯一的依靠，也是最后的护盾，如果连它都不熟悉的话我们是无法生存的。
ええ。ハイペリオン号は私たちが外で唯一頼りにできるものだし、最後の盾だから。それすら詳しくないようじゃ、生きていけないわ。
그래. 히페리온 호는 우리가 밖에서 유일히 의지할 수 있는 것이자 마지막 방패야. 그것마저 자세히 모른다면 살아남을 수 없어.
Well, after all, Hubertarian is the only thing we rely on out there and the last shield, we can't survive if we're not even familiar with it.
Yes. The Hyperion is the only thing we can rely on out there, and it's our last shield. We can't live with ourselves if we don't even know about it.

1247: Everything should be fine now. The main gun should function normally.
这样应该没问题了，主炮应该可以运作了。
これできっと大丈夫。主砲を動かせるはずよ。
이제야 괜찮을 거야. 주포를 움직일 수 있을 테니까.
This should be fine and the main gun should be operational.
It's going to be okay. We should be able to move the main gun.
Good, let’s get off before the surrounding Houkai creatures find us.
嗯，趁着周围的崩坏生物还没发现我们，赶紧撤离吧。
ええ、周りの崩壊生物が気づいていないうちに急いで離れましょう。
그래, 주변의 붕괴 생물이 눈치채지 못한 사이에 서둘러 떠나자.
Well, let's evacuate before the surrounding avalanche creatures find us.
Yes, hurry away before the decaying organisms around you notice.
Are we still taking the ventilation tunnel...
また排気ダクトを抜けていくの……？
또 배기 덕트를 빠져 나가는 거……?
Or do you go through the ventilation pipe ......
Is it going through the exhaust duct again ......?
No way... My back will break if we crawl again in that position...
不行了…那个姿势再爬一圈的话我的腰就要断了……
うぅ……またあんな姿勢で這いつくばったら、私の腰が曲がったまま戻らなくなる。
우우…… 또 그런 자세로 기어다니다간, 내 허리가 구부러진 채로 돌아오지 않을 거야.
I can not ... that position and then climb a circle, my waist will be broken ......
Ugh ...... if I crawl in that position again, my hips won't be able to return to their bent position.
既然这样的话还有一个选择。
それならもう1つ選択肢があるわ。
그럼 한 가지 선택지가 더 있어.
In that case there is another option.
We can crawl over from the outer armor of the battleship.
从战舰外面的装甲板上爬过去。
戦艦の外装甲を這い上って行くの。
Climb over the armor plate on the outside of the battleship.
They crawl up the exterior armor of the battleship.
The ship is still moving! Are you in a circus!?
这可是在行驶中啊！你们是耍杂技么喂！
今は走行中なのよ！そんな雑技みたいなマネ、私にはできないわよ！
지금은 주행 중이잖아! 그런 잡기 같은 소릴, 내가 할 수 있을 리 없어!
This is in motion! Are you guys doing acrobatics?
We're on the road! I can't do that kind of choreography!
